<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Cloud Kitchen">21d5914c9773651080e3fef3a253af0c</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1c18d9cc9773651080e3fef3a253af53</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Eat Get Price Client Script</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

	alert('hello' + orderMenuItem);
	
	g_form.getReference('orderMenuItem', function(ref) {						
		//g_form.removeDecoration('caller_id', 'icon-star', 'VIP');
 
		//if (ref.getValue('vip') == 'true')
		//	g_form.addDecoration('caller_id', 'icon-star', 'VIP');			
		
		var itemPrice =  ref.getValue('price');
		g_form.setValue('orderPrice', itemPrice);		
	});   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>shey.delacruz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-29 00:37:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6c9cad5097f3a51080e3fef3a253af20</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Eat Get Price Client Script</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Eat your Heart Out " source="x_1083337_eat">b012b03f9723251080e3fef3a253afb1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Eat your Heart Out ">b012b03f9723251080e3fef3a253afb1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6c9cad5097f3a51080e3fef3a253af20</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>shey.delacruz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-29 03:40:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
